data.message:
#MarshallBruceMathersIII

The one who is at the bottom of the ladder will not have the same vision as the one at the top
The one who is at the top should sometimes go back down to earth and see more closely what he sees only from a distance, but 
Perhaps this is what he wants, a leader, those who follow him
And all those who isolate it, its chains, the money does not make happiness
He messes up everything he touches, imprisons, poisons
Becomes a need, a lack, a language
A leader, our leader, his need to understand
His lack of contact, his freedom was robbed
Tonight I hurt for him who of many remains misunderstood
All turn to him when they have trouble
Who can he turn to when he goes wrong?
What we live, what he lives, what you feel, what he feels, 
And what I feel !!!
